mapper.select: select count(1) from teacher where teacherNumber=#{teacherNumber} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into teacher(teacherNumber, name, password, professionalId) values (#{teacherNumber},#{name},#{password},#{professionalId})
mapper.update: update teacher set name = #{name} , password = #{password} , professionalId = #{professionalId} where teacherNumber = #{teacherNumber}
